title: First Look: Cannondale Revives The SuperX Name for Its New Go-Fast Gravel Bike
content:
Cannondale's fast gravel bike is back with a familiar name, big tire clearance, and SRAM UDH.

Read the full article at First Look: Cannondale Revives The SuperX Name for Its New Go-Fast Gravel Bike on Velo.
author: Alvin Holbrook
